official_title: A bill to promote public confidence in the integrity of Federal employees by requiring such employees to make certain financial disclosures.

summary.text: Requires the annual filing with the Comptroller General of statements by Federal employees disclosing any income or gift exceeding $1000 received by such employees or their spouses during the preceding calendar year. Sets forth penalties for those covered by this Act who willfully fail to file the reports covered by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to promote public confidence in the integrity of Federal employees by requiring such employees to make certain financial disclosures.
